explanation: Funds are returned to National Guard Personnel, Army, after being previously transferred to Military Personnel, Army pursuant to Section 13001 of the CARES Act, as the funds are no longer required in Military Personnel, Army. This is a CARES Act division B, Title III, requirement.

Funds are available for transfer because the Army began to ship new recruits to basic training earlier and faster than initially expected. This greatly reduced the number of Service Members entitled to ‘Delayed Shipment Incentive, freeing funds for realignment to other Department COVID-19 requirements. This is Division B, Title III, CARES Act funding.

Funds are required for non-medical Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) to limit the transmission of infections in order to protect the force and ensure the continuation of the Army’s missions. This is a CARES Act division B, Title III, requirement.
